name: Selbyr
description:
Selbyr

Violence doesn't resolve anyting. In Selbyr, you incarnate a kind of entity who fights discrmination the way everybody should do : with words. 

Selbyr is a wave by wave 2D shooter game. The goal is to defend discriminated people from discrimation itself until the 40th wave. Good luck!

Lemon Inc,

Philémon Caron & Mathieu Schmerber
